What new state law led to the directive for Manatee County School District teachers to cover up or remove their books?
When did HB 1467 go into effect?
July 2022
What is the purpose of HB 1467?
To require a formal approval process for books with a certified school librarian or media specialist before being made available to Florida public school students
Which group has lobbied for more than 150 books to be removed from Florida school libraries?
Moms For Liberty
What are some examples of books targeted by Moms For Liberty?
The Color Purple, The Handmaid’s Tale
What other conservative education laws has Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis promoted in the past two years?
Banning critical race theory and the Don't Say Gay bill
How are the laws banning critical race theory, the Don't Say Gay bill, and HB 1467 interconnected?
They create an environment of uncertainty and restrictions on teachers and classrooms
What statute does the text of HB 1467 cite, and what does it mean for teachers?
Florida statute 847.012; it makes distributing sexually obscene material to minors a felony
What are some potential consequences for teachers if they do not comply with HB 1467?
Penalties against teaching certificates, not being rehired, and even felony charges
What course was blocked by the Florida Department of Education in January?
Advanced Placement high school course on African American Studies
